main.name: Faisal A.R
main.occupation: CEO of Studio F3 and Cadd Lab
main.bio: Hi there! I am Faisal Abdul Rasheed!. I've been in the Architecture Industry for over 10 years now. As a Full time Devoloper or a Designer I've worked both with startups and large corporations to help build & scale their companies. Along the journey I realised my passion existed in helping others excel and pursue their dreams. With this passion, I have now constructed and designed so many Houses and Schools and etc.. across the globe. Through live coaching sessions on Youtube, I have accumulated several thousand's views demonstrating how to apply developer skills in a range of cool builds and challenges. I deliver REAL VALUE by teaching REAL WORLD projects and Softwares to help students enter the world of Architect, Engennering and Designing. Youâ€™ll get hands-on experience and learn the skills that are required to succeed in the real-world in this community.

work.title: Founder and CEO
work.description: Constructing and Designing as long as possible.

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
